title: I read a book a while ago on Wattpad and I cannot for the life of me remember the title or the author and I'd really like to re-read it. I'd there any way I could find this book? - Quora

response.answer_text: Can you remember any “unique" words or names (e.g. of people, places etc). For example, I remember a “book” with a girl named “Scout", whose “father” was involved in a “trial. Just Google those words and “To Kill a Mockingbird" pops up. Let's try a much less famous book. My “doctor" has written a “novel" set in “Haifa". Just those words pops up the correct link (by the way, it's a great read) The Waiting Room by Leah Kaminsky
